task_description: 生成3D卡通风格的白色包子图标，Q版可爱造型，顶部带旋转褶皱纹理，高光塑料质感，商业级渲染质量

input_data.text_prompt: A cute 3D cartoon Chinese steamed bun (baozi) icon, white fluffy appearance with soft cream color (#F5F5DC), top has clear twisted pleated texture in light yellow (#FFE4B5), round and plump shape, smooth surface with glossy highlights, ceramic-like texture, 3/4 front view angle, double light source from top and 45-degree front, soft shadows, pure white background, ultra-high resolution 3D rendering, commercial quality, Pixar style, C4D rendering, octane render, studio lighting, product photography style
design_requirements: 主体为Q版白色包子，圆润饱满造型
顶部褶皱纹理清晰可见，呈旋转状
表面光滑带高光，陶瓷/塑料质感
色彩：白色主体(#F5F5DC) + 浅黄褶皱(#FFE4B5)
3/4正面视角，顶部+前方45度双光源
input_data.negative_prompt: flat design, 2D illustration, realistic photo, dark background, complex scene, multiple objects, text, watermark, low quality, blurry, distorted shape, dirty texture, unappetizing

metadata.notes: 3D卡通风格包子图标，参考吼巷IP设计风格，Q版可爱造型，高光质感，商业级渲染
